short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Carousel by de Mobo turns your phone into a photo slide projector.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Carousel by de Mobo turns your phone into a photo slide projector. 

It is available on Android and iPhone.
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.demobo.carousel
https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/carousel-by-de-mobo/id968555482?ls=1&mt=8

Visit http://www.demobo.com/carousel on your computer and connect your Carousel app by entering a code provided by the app. 
It has multiple of slideshow animations to choose from.
